column5: I thought it was decent, something to do on a cold day when I'm stuck in the city My 4 year old son liked driving the RC boat (the guys working the RC boat thing are great) and he liked pulling in the rainbow from the fish pond that I snagged in the mouth for him, lol
I was there. Decent show, lots of nice fishing boats, Bill's Bait and Tackle had a good amount of stock there! I picked up a New St. Croix Mojo Bass Glass crankbait rod I was wanting.
I was there as well, picked up a long overdue tackle bag. Love those Stanley boats!
Didn't get out there this year but I was there last year and it's a nice little show! Same as the other's that this company puts on the London & Barrie shows as well!
LOL Chris  After many trips to the pond at the sportsman show, I watched and then learned this was how it was done. Force feed them . The 2¬† boys enjoyed their times .üòÅ
they had weighted, unbaited, small barbless hooks on the rods, I asked the kid working there "what's the deal", he said try and drift it into their mouth, lol

I always remember being a little kid at the Sportsman show with my Pop (Grandfather) and him trying to sneak popcorn onto one of the rods we were using at the pond.¬† A guy saw him trying and just as I thought "busted" he smiled and just acted if he hadn't noticed lol
My brother always hits me up for a few little roe bags before the show.¬† His kids do alright lol.
